nodes.text: The Camblia system was a star system located within the Colonies and Southern Core regions. The system was the origin point of the group known as the Camblian Order, which had a presence on the Outer Rim Territories planet Eedoq.
The Camblia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square L-13.
